page_description: Manage your account settings and preferences
name_min_length: Name must be at least 2 characters
name_max_length: Name must be less than 50 characters
email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address
password_min_length: Password must be at least 8 characters
password_requirements: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number
change_password_description: Leave blank if you don't want to change your password
update_info_description: Update your account information and password
verification_code_sent: Verification code sent to your email
enter_valid_verification_code: Please enter a valid 6-digit verification code
app_notifications_description: Don't miss any notification with instant notifications inside the app.
email_notifications_description: Get emails to know what's happening while offline.
